comments:
Build ID: I20070323-1616

Steps To Reproduce:
1.Create a Stock chart, and new three series.
2.In Format Chart tab, set type of Y series 2 to bar series, and set it to stacked.
3. After that, any exception will be throwed.

I can't ensure if the stacked combo of series should be enabled when current chart is stock chart?

More information:

	at org.eclipse.birt.chart.computation.withaxes.PlotWith2DAxes.getMinMax(PlotWith2DAxes.java:454)

It is not stacked combo box, should be stacked Check Box.

Checkin the partial fix so the exception is at least not shown in UI. then we 
can defer the fix to hide the exception from the log.

Before drawing the value series options, check whether the series can be stacked, If no, passing a parameter ?canStack = false? to SeriesOptionChooser, so ?Stacked? checkbox for all series would be disabled.

When user chooses non-stackable Series from ?Type? dropdown list, redraw the options area for all value series. If ?Stacked? checkbox is ticked, then set it un-ticked and set series.setStacked(false).
